text: Dimaadua ga helekai, “Nia laangi ga dau mai, gei nia huwa laagau ga tomo aga hagalimalima, koia e limalima i di maa dela ma gaa hadi. Nia ‘grape’ ga tomo aga koia e tomo limalima i nia waini ala ma gaa hai. Nia gonduu ga haga hali iha nia waini kala, gei nia gowaa nnoonua ga haga hali mai nia waini.
